00005 #include <graphicize.h>

00007 // taille par defaut de la demi-branche de la croix representant
00008 // graphiquement une configuration (repere "monde")
00009 double Cross_Size = 0.05;
00010 
00011 // gestion de la taille par defaut de la demi-branche de la croix
00012 // representant graphiquement une configuration (repere "monde")
00013 void set_cross_size (double size) { Cross_Size = size; }
00014 
00015 // pas de discretisation par defaut pour l'affichage graphique d'une
00016 // clotoide (repere "monde")
00017 double Clothoid_Step = 0.05;
00018 
00019 // gestion du pas de discretisation par defaut pour l'affichage graphique
00020 // d'une clotoide (repere "monde")
00021 void set_clothoid_step (double step) { Clothoid_Step = step; }
00022 
00023 // transformation du cc-turn defini par un cc-circle c et une configuration
00024 // d'arrivee q (supposee appartenir au cc-circle et avoir une orientation
00025 // correcte) en un ensemble d'objets graphiques.  le booleen cusps indique
00026 // si l'on se place dans le cas avec ou sans point de rebroussement
00027 void cc_turn_graphicize (SMT_CC_Circle c, SMT_Configuration q, bool cusps,
00028                          FLTK_Display *display,
00029                          Fl_Color color, int style,  int width) {
00030   double deflection_min = twopify (pow (c.kappa, 2) / fabs (c.sigma));
00031   // calcul de la deflection
00032   double deflection;
00033   double alpha_c = c.start.theta;
00034   double alpha_q = q.theta;
00035   if ( c.left && c.forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_q - alpha_c); }
00036   if ( c.left && !c.forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_c - alpha_q); }
00037   if ( !c.left && c.forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_c - alpha_q); }
00038   if ( !c.left && !c.forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_q - alpha_c); }
00039 
00040   // *** deflection nulle -> cc-turn = segment
00041   FLTK_Line *li;
00042   if ( fabs (deflection) < get_epsilon () ) { 
00043     li = new FLTK_Line (c.start.x, c.start.y,
00044                        q.x, q.y,
00045                        color, style, width);
00046     display->add_object (li);
00047     return; }
00048 
00049   // *** cc-turn irregulier
00050   FLTK_Clothoid *cl;
00051   double x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i;
00052   if ( deflection < deflection_min ) { 
00053     // sharpness et longueur d'un arc de clotoide
00054     double d1 = D1 (deflection / 2);
00055     double d2 = point_distance (c.start.x, c.start.y, 
00056                                 q.x, q.y);
00057     double sharpness = 4 * Pi * pow (d1, 2) / pow (d2, 2);
00058     double length =  sqrt (deflection / sharpness);
00059     // configuration intermediaire
00060     if ( !c.left ) { sharpness = - sharpness; } // signe de sigma
00061     // affichage arcs de clotoide
00062     end_of_clothoid (c.start.x, c.start.y,
00063                      c.start.theta, 0,
00064                      sharpness, c.forward, length,
00065                      &x_i, &y_i, &theta_i, &kappa_i);
00066     cl = new FLTK_Clothoid (c.start.x, c.start.y,
00067                            c.start.theta, 0,
00068                            x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i,
00069                            sharpness, c.forward, length, Clothoid_Step,
00070                            color, style, width);
00071     display->add_object (cl);
00072     cl = new FLTK_Clothoid (q.x, q.y,
00073                            q.theta, 0,
00074                            x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i,
00075                            sharpness, !c.forward, length, Clothoid_Step,
00076                            color, style, width);
00077     display->add_object (cl);
00078     return; }
00079 
00080   // *** cc-turn regulier
00081   FLTK_Arc *ar;
00082   double length_min = fabs (c.kappa / c.sigma);
00083   // affichage arcs de clotoide
00084   cl = new FLTK_Clothoid (c.start.x, c.start.y,
00085                          c.start.theta, 0,
00086                          c.first.x, c.first.y,
00087                          c.first.theta, c.first.kappa,
00088                          c.sigma, c.forward, length_min, Clothoid_Step,
00089                          color, style, width);
00090   display->add_object (cl);
00091   end_of_clothoid (q.x, q.y, q.theta, 0,
00092                    c.sigma, !c.forward, length_min,
00093                    &x_i, &y_i, &theta_i, &kappa_i);
00094   cl = new FLTK_Clothoid (q.x, q.y, q.theta, 0,
00095                          x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i,
00096                          c.sigma, !c.forward, length_min, Clothoid_Step,
00097                          color, style, width);
00098   display->add_object (cl);
00099   // affichage rayons du cc-circle
00100   li = new FLTK_Line (c.xc, c.yc, c.first.x, c.first.y,
00101                      FL_GRAY, FL_DASH, 0);              
00102   display->add_object (li);
00103   li = new FLTK_Line (c.xc, c.yc, x_i, y_i, 
00104                      FL_GRAY, FL_DOT, 0);
00105   display->add_object (li);
00106 
00107   // cc-turn regulier
00108   bool ccw;
00109   if ( cusps && (deflection > deflection_min + Pi) ) {
00110     // cas avec manoeuvres
00111     if ( c.left ) { ccw = !c.forward; } else { ccw = c.forward; }
00112   }
00113   else {
00114     // cas sans manoeuvres
00115     if ( c.left ) { ccw = c.forward; } else { ccw = !c.forward; }
00116   }
00117   ar = new FLTK_Arc (c.first.x, c.first.y, x_i, y_i,
00118                     c.xc, c.yc, fabs (1 / c.kappa), ccw,
00119                     color, style, width);
00120   display->add_object (ar);
00121 }
00122 
00123 // configuration
00124 void graphicize (SMT_Configuration q,
00125                  FLTK_Display *display,  
00126                  Fl_Color color, int style, int width) {
00127   double size = 0.1;
00128   FLTK_Cross *c;
00129   c = new FLTK_Cross (q.x, q.y, size, color, style, width);
00130   display->add_object (c);
00131   FLTK_Line *l;
00132   l = new FLTK_Line (q.x, q.y, q.x + 2 * size * cos (q.theta), 
00133                     q.y + 2 * size * sin (q.theta),
00134                     color, style, width);
00135   display->add_object (l);
00136 }
00137 
00138 // cc-circle
00139 void graphicize (SMT_CC_Circle c,
00140                  FLTK_Display *display,  
00141                  Fl_Color color, int style, int width) {
00142   graphicize (c.start, display, color, style, width);
00143   graphicize (c.first, display, color, style, width);
00144   FLTK_Circle *circle;
00145   circle = new FLTK_Circle (c.xc, c.yc, c.radius, color, style, width);
00146   display->add_object (circle);
00147   FLTK_Line *line;
00148   line = new FLTK_Line (c.xc, c.yc, c.start.x, c.start.y, 
00149                        color, style, width);
00150   display->add_object (line); 
00151   FLTK_Clothoid *clothoid;
00152   clothoid = new FLTK_Clothoid (c.start.x, c.start.y, 
00153                                c.start.theta, c.start.kappa,
00154                                c.first.x, c.first.y, 
00155                                c.first.theta, c.first.kappa,
00156                                c.sigma, c.forward, 
00157                                fabs (c.kappa / c.sigma),
00158                                Clothoid_Step,
00159                                color, style, width);
00160   display->add_object (clothoid); 
00161 }

00163 // cc-dubins path
00164 void graphicize (SMT_CC_Dubins_Path p,
00165                  FLTK_Display *display,  
00166                  Fl_Color color, int style, int width) {
00167   FLTK_Line *li;
00168 
00169   // configurations de depart et d'arrivee
00170   graphicize (p.start, display, color, style, width);
00171   graphicize (p.end, display, color, style, width);
00172 
00173   // configurations intermediaires
00174   if ( !null (p.qi1) ) 
00175     { graphicize (*(p.qi1), display, color, style, width); }
00176   if ( !null (p.qi2) ) 
00177     { graphicize (*(p.qi2), display, color, style, width); }
00178 
00179   switch ( p.type ) {
00180   case EMPTY: break;
00181   case S:
00182     li = new FLTK_Line (p.start.x, p.start.y,
00183                        p.end.x, p.end.y,
00184                        color, style, width);
00185     display->add_object (li);
00186     break;
00187   case R: case L:
00188     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), p.end, false, 
00189                         display, color, style, width);
00190     break;
00191   case SL: case SR:
00192     li = new FLTK_Line (p.start.x, p.start.y,
00193                        p.qi1->x, p.qi1->y,
00194                        color, style, width);
00195     display->add_object (li);
00196     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi1), false, 
00197                         display, color, style, width);
00198     break;
00199   case RS: case LS:
00200     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), false, 
00201                         display, color, style, width);
00202     li = new FLTK_Line (p.qi1->x, p.qi1->y,
00203                        p.end.x, p.end.y,
00204                        color, style, width);
00205     display->add_object (li);
00206     break;
00207   case LSL: case LSR: case RSL: case RSR: 
00208     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), false, 
00209                         display, color, style, width);
00210     li = new FLTK_Line (p.qi1->x, p.qi1->y,
00211                        p.qi2->x, p.qi2->y,
00212                        color, style, width);
00213     display->add_object (li);
00214     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi2), false, 
00215                         display, color, style, width);
00216     break;
00217   case LR1L: case LR2L: case RL1R: case RL2R:
00218     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), false, 
00219                         display, color, style, width);
00220     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.ci1), *(p.qi2), false, 
00221                         display, color, style, width);
00222     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi2), false, 
00223                         display, color, style, width);
00224     break;
00225   default: break; }
00226 }

00228 // cc-reeds-shepp path
00229 void graphicize (SMT_CC_RS_Path p,
00230                  FLTK_Display *display,  
00231                  Fl_Color color, int style, int width) {
00232   FLTK_Line *li;
00233 
00234   // configurations de depart et d'arrivee
00235   graphicize (p.start, display, color, style, width);
00236   graphicize (p.end, display, color, style, width);
00237 
00238   // configurations intermediaires
00239   if ( !null (p.qi1) ) 
00240     { graphicize (*(p.qi1), display, color, style, width); }
00241   if ( !null (p.qi2) ) 
00242     { graphicize (*(p.qi2), display, color, style, width); }
00243   if ( !null (p.qi3) ) 
00244     { graphicize (*(p.qi3), display, color, style, width); }
00245   if ( !null (p.qi4) ) 
00246     { graphicize (*(p.qi4), display, color, style, width); }
00247 
00248   switch ( p.type ) {
00249   case Empty: break;
00250   case Segment:
00251     li = new FLTK_Line (p.start.x, p.start.y,
00252                        p.end.x, p.end.y,
00253                        color, style, width);
00254     display->add_object (li);
00255     break;
00256   case T:
00257     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), p.end, true, 
00258                         display, color, style, width);
00259     break;
00260   case TT: case TcT:
00261     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), true, 
00262                         display, color, style, width);
00263     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi1), true, 
00264                         display, color, style, width);
00265     break;
00266   case TST: case TcST: case TScT: case TcScT:
00267     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), true, 
00268                         display, color, style, width);
00269     li = new FLTK_Line (p.qi1->x, p.qi1->y,
00270                        p.qi2->x, p.qi2->y,
00271                        color, style, width);
00272     display->add_object (li);
00273     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi2), true, 
00274                         display, color, style, width);
00275     break;
00276   case TTT: case TcTT: case TTcT: case TcTcT:
00277     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cstart), *(p.qi1), true, 
00278                         display, color, style, width);
00279     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.ci1), *(p.qi2), true, 
00280                         display, color, style, width);
00281     cc_turn_graphicize (*(p.cend), *(p.qi2), true, 
00282                         display, color, style, width);
00283     break;
00284   default: break; }
00285 }
